name: SolidPass
overview:
SolidPass is a provider of software-based security tokens.

SolidPass protects enterprises and their customers from fraud, digital attacks or information theft through advanced security software.

SolidPass shields institutions from digital fraud by converting mobile phones, internet browsers and desktop applications into robust security tokens.

By eliminating the need for hardware tokens, SolidPass guarantees the highest levels of security at a fraction of the cost and without the hassle of traditional two-factor authentication tokens.

SolidPass-enabled devices authenticate users and secure transactions digitally, protect sensitive information and documents, eliminate fraud, build confidence and increase customer satisfaction for financial institutions, e-commerce companies, government bodies and other entities that demand the most modern, cost-effective, flexible and customizable digital security devices on the market.
